descriptionHTML:
New themes available -Merry Christmas and may the force be with you-

Arlie Watch is an excellent watch face design for Android Wear. It provides useful features and the Individual design brings out your taste.

Features:

1. Support both round and square watch.
2. Elegant with fashionable style.
3. Support analog and digital styles separately for interactive and ambient modes
4. Interactive mode to see weather and batter detail
5. Battery Percentage indicator for Phone and Wear.
6. Date and day of week.
7. 12 hours and 24 hours time format.

More customization options will be added in future updates.
recentChanges: Add settings shortcut option to directly launch Settings from watch face
Fix wrong interactive area detection on 1.6
2. Enable interactive mode on digital clock face
1. More themes available for premium users
3. Fix detail screen layout for resolution 280x280
1. Sweep/step option now available for second hand movement
2. Enlarge touch area for date to open agenda
